verbs.description: [V: peru] [ARG1: court] orders fujimori detention in graft probe peru powerful opposition leader keiko fujimori was taken into custody on wednesday after a court ordered she be held in preventive detention for three years pending the outcome of a corruption probe court scuppers fujimori concepcion carhuanco keiko fujimori fujimori alberto fujimori peru odebrecht president richard concepcion carhuancho jose domingo perez prosecutor popular force party
